pkgmetadata.longdescription: IPMIView is a GUI-based software application that allows administrators to manage multiple target systems through BMC. IPMIView supports Supermicros BMCs that adheres to either IPMI v1.5 or v2.0. IPMIView monitors and reports on the status of a SuperBlade system, including the blade server, power supply, gigabit switch, InfiniBand and CMM modules. IPMIView also supports remote KVM and Virtual Media.
